attributes.action: Ensure Ealing Hospital in Southall keeps it's A & E unit and other acute services (Maternity, Childrens) which are all under threat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NHS London plan to downgrade Ealing Hospital so much that if this goes
through unchallenged it could mean the loss of all its acute (ie. emergency services) including Maternity,
paediatrics and A and E) and other services too. These
services have not been lost from the hospital (yet) we
need your support to keep them.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ensure Ealing Hospital in Southall keeps it's A & E unit and other acute services (Maternity, Childrens) which are all under threat.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=SaveEalingsAandE


Her Majesty's Government
